name: Blendy!
description:
It's so satisfying! Relax and blend your stresses away in the number one blending simulation game!

- Take customer orders and make their juices
- Blend the right amount of each ingredient to make the perfect juice. Can you keep the customers happy?
- Unlock new ingredients as you play and make heaps of tasty, refreshing juices
- New customer orders and ingredients are constantly being added!

It's so fun to blend, you won't want to stop!

---
Reviews
Please rate Blendy and leave us a review! We love hearing from our fans! If you have suggestions or support queries, please email us at support@majorfrank.com
